quotes.message: Don't be disappointed, the winning side is not always the right one.
quotes.name: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.message: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.name: Mike Ditka

quotes.message: Learn how to be a loser, because it's important to be a loser to be a winner.
quotes.name: Sanford I. Weill

quotes.message: Maybe the truth is, there's a little bit of loser in all of us. Being happy isn't having everything in your life be perfect. Maybe it's about stringing together all the little things.
quotes.name: Ann Brashares

quotes.message: Losers fix the blame; winners fix what caused the problem.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: Perfection is man's ultimate illusion. It simply doesn't exist in the universe. If you are a perfectionist, you are guaranteed to be a loser in whatever you do.
quotes.name: David D. Burns

quotes.message: If at first you don't succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.
quotes.name: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.message: Second place is just the first place loser.
quotes.name: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.message: How you respond to the challenge in the second half will determine what you become after the game, whether you are a winner or a loser.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: The cheerful loser is the winner.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: A peace is of the nature of a conquest; for then both parties nobly are subdued, and neither party loser.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: Losers live in the past. Winners learn from the past and enjoy working in the present toward the future.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: The moment you think that your destiny is predetermined, you become a miserable loser! Trust your own power so that you can shape your own destiny!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: Be careful you don't give up on what is yet to give you victory. Many people quit when they were yet to win. Successful people never quit and I believe no quitter had ever been successful too.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: The path of least resistance is the path of the loser.
quotes.name: H. G. Wells

quotes.message: The fear of losing anything is the inability to prepare for the best.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: One who doesn't recognise an opportunity is bigger loser than one who tries his hand at an opportunity.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: It seems that fighting is a game where everybody is the loser.
quotes.name: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.message: It's not that he was going nowhere, it's that he'd already arrived.
quotes.name: Janet Fitch

quotes.message: Stand up for the underdog, the loser. Sometimes having the strength to show loving support for unacknowledged others turns the tides of our own lives.
quotes.name: Alexandra Katehakis

quotes.message: When you know that someone is playing love games with you and still you are there then it means either you are a true lover or a true loser.
quotes.name: Jasmine Kiyani

quotes.message: The only difference between a winner and a loser is that one second when the winner decided not to give up.
quotes.name: Vikrmn

quotes.message: It's okay to be a loser, these are people who tried to blend in with the world, still get the disrespect he doesn't deserve. decides to be just themselves. and still there's a girl you dream about, has someone else.
quotes.name: Jericho Pasaoa

quotes.message: Don't try to impress a loser because If one is not happy about the things happening in their life, one cannot be happy about the things happening in someone else's life.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: Losers always has an excuse Winner always find a way.
quotes.name: Noormohammad Bhuayan

quotes.message: Losers doesn't require a miracle to Win.
quotes.name: Leo Ausdauer Wirabuana

quotes.message: To be a good loser is to learn how to win.
quotes.name: Carl Sandburg

quotes.message: He's got that â€˜born to lose and lose violently' air about him. That's good.
quotes.name: Daniel Woodrell

quotes.message: Winners do what losers don't want to do.
quotes.name: Gary Busey

quotes.message: A winner rebukes and forgives; a loser is too timid to rebuke and too petty to forgive.
quotes.name: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.message: A loser doesn't know what he'll do if he loses, but talks about what he'll do if he wins, and a winner doesn't talk about what he'll do if he wins, but knows what he'll do if he loses.
quotes.name: Eric Berne

quotes.message: So when they win, it's their hard work. And when they lose, it's their bad luck.
quotes.name: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.message: Let me lose everything on earth and the world beyond, but let me not lose what I'm craving for, let it be that i died on the way than retreating from getting it.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: What separates the winners from the losers is how a person reacts to each new twist of fate.
quotes.name: Donald Trump

quotes.message: You crave winning and fear losing instead of just doing.
quotes.name: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.message: There's nothing wrong with being a loser, it just depends on how good you are at it.
quotes.name: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.message: Losers have goals. Winners have systems.
quotes.name: Scott Adams

quotes.message: Show me a good loser and I will show you a loser.
quotes.name: Paul Newman

quotes.message: You have to be able to be a good loser. You have to be okay knowing you're going to fail every day in something without getting mad and upset.
quotes.name: Dan O'Brien

quotes.message: At war, there's no right or wrong. Winner's right while loser's wrong.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: No one knows what to say in the loser's locker room.
quotes.name: Muhammad Ali

quotes.message: The truth about losers, they aren't people who enjoy being laughed at, they aren't the people who has a different clothing, it's just being your true selves, without having the effort to be cool. true winners are losers.
quotes.name: Jericho Pasaoa

quotes.message: Losers make promises they often break. Winners make commitments they always keep.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: When you dont produce results.The results produce themselves and wont favour you.
quotes.name: De philosopher DJ Kyos

quotes.message: A winner is just a loser who tried one more time.
quotes.name: George Augustus Moore

quotes.message: You can be good at many things, but you can only be great at one thing, until you find that thing, you are an average loser.
quotes.name: M.F. Moonzajer
